content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CANADA PAYROLL\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regular pay is based on a forty (40) hour work week. Overtime eligibility is outlined in an employee’s employment agreement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Standard work hours may vary by position, and should be discussed at the start of employment, and as changes are needed, with your manager. It is important that you follow a consistent set of hours that both the client and your teammates can expect. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note, for employees who bill time to a client, lunch breaks are not billable to a client unless you are working through lunch (eating lunch while working) or attending a business lunch with the client.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PAY CYCLE/PERIOD\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Paydays are on a semi-monthly schedule, falling on the 15th and the last day of each month. If a payday falls on a weekend or holiday, employees will be paid on the preceding business day before the weekend or holiday. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DIRECT DEPOSIT\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Payment is deposited directly into your bank account. To set up direct deposit, a void cheque or a completed direct deposit form from your financial institution must be submitted to Canada People Operations Team  upon hire. If your direct deposit information is not received within the payroll processing deadline, your first pay may be mailed to you as a physical cheque. Changes to your direct deposit account may happen at any time as long as you provide account change information in your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://online.adp.com/signin/v1/?APPID=WFNPortal&productId=80e309c3-7085-bae1-e053-3505430b5495&returnURL=https://workforcenow.adp.com/&callingAppId=WFN\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ADP Workforce Now\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" profile  at least eight (8) business days prior to pay day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ACCESSING YOUR PAYSTUB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After your first EPAM Canada pay, instructions will be emailed to you in order to register for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://online.adp.com/signin/v1/?APPID=WFNPortal&productId=80e309c3-7085-bae1-e053-3505430b5495&returnURL=https://workforcenow.adp.com/&callingAppId=WFN\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ADP Workforce Now\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  ADP Workforce Now is a payroll system which you will be able to access & change your personal contact, emergency contact and direct deposit information.  Additionally, you will be able to view your pay statements and T4s. The pay statement will indicate all earnings, deductions withheld, and the net amount deposited into your bank account. The T4 will be needed when you file your income taxes with the Canadian government.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you do not receive the email notification to register for ADP Workforce Now, please contact the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFA%20HR%20Operations%20CA%20%3cWFAHROperationsCA@epam.com%3e\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Canada People Operations Team\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MANDATORY DEDUCTIONS FROM PAY\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada is required by law to make certain deductions from your pay each time one is issued. Among these are your federal and provincial income taxes and your contribution to Social Programs as required by law (i.e., employment insurance, provincial healthcare taxes, federal/provincial pension plans, taxable benefits, etc.). These deductions will be itemized on your pay statement . The amount of the deductions may depend on your earnings and on the information you provide on your federal and provincial tax forms.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to ensure the proper tax deductions are made, you should review your personal circumstance and make any changes in marital status, number of dependents, or number of exemptions as needed and provided to the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFA%20HR%20Operations%20CA%20%3cWFAHROperationsCA@epam.com%3e\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Canada  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Changes to home address and telephone number can be made directly in your ADP Workforce Now profile.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"color\":\"#303240\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"RU\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WAGE ASSIGNMENTS (GARNISHMENTS)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada must execute any court-ordered wage assignment or garnishment against your wages. However, whenever court-ordered deductions are to be taken from your pay, you will be notified in writing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ERRORS IN PAY\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every effort is made to avoid errors in your pay. If you believe an error has been made, contact\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAPayrollCanada@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Payroll Canada\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" immediately. Steps will be taken to investigate the problem and ensure that any necessary correction is made.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CHANGES TO PERSONAL INFORMATION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keeping your personal information is important with regards to pay, deductions, benefits and other matters. regardless of if you have worked for part or all of the tax year (January 1 to December 31).\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Canada will provide you with a T4 (Statement of Remuneration Paid) before February 28 which details any gross income paid and deductions made by EPAM Canada. The deadline for filing your tax return is April 30 of each year or has directed by the Canadian government.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please find below some useful informational websites provided by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to assist in gathering much of the information required for filing your tax
